summary:
My profile:
- Trilingual senior administrative and service-oriented professional with experience in Finance, HR and payroll
- Proven ability to perform dual roles 
- Experience with team supervision and management of team output
- Experience with managing confidential information within multicultural and politically sensitive environments 
- Extensively travelled and fluent in French (mother tongue), English and Spanish
- Spoken Dutch, Italian understood.

- Management of staff contracts and allowances.', 'title': 'Finance/HR Assistant', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Embassy of Spain', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Embassy of Spain', 'description': '- Provide Diplomats with general administrative assistance, mainly to the Alternate Permanent Representative to the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) and participate in some meetings occasionally.
- Manage clearance requests for overflights over Dutch territories (including Dutch Caribbean islands).
- Translations (Dutch/English/French/Spanish).
- Support Spanish nationals´ candidatures for jobs in International Organisations in The Hague.', 'title': 'Personal Assistant to Diplomats', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 264431, 'name': 'Cour Pénale Internationale (CPI) - International Criminal Court (ICC)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEiMaKxRFVe5A/company-logo_400_400/0/1626421994588?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ONr6QgCib8trVCn7wnUbUHSj2ZNnmhVOxlJzBhMRTVc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/international-criminal-court---cour-p-nale-internationale/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'International Criminal Court', 'description': 'Human Resources Section, Entitlements and Payroll Unit:
- Serviced and informed around 200 clients about their entitlements and contracts all along their career, and briefed new staff members about rules and entitlements after bringing them on board.
- Updated and actioned all personnel changes (in SAP) related to the payroll (contracts, benefits, allowances) and controlled calculations of payslips.
- Prepare contracts and diverse paperwork.
- Registered and arranged travel entitlements in SAP (including on appointment and separation).
- Supervised the completion of Performance Appraisal Forms to renew contracts.
- Participated as an Interviewer for the UN Language Proficiency Examination in French for two years.', 'title': 'Human Resources and Payroll Assistant', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'International Criminal Court', 'description': 'Financial/HR Assistant and Meetings Assistant (dual role),
Secretariat of the Assembly of States Parties:

1) Financial and HR Assistant:
- Budget monitoring (Excel and SAP).
- Preparing financial reports, participate in the yearly closure of the budget.
- Registration of invoices in SAP ensuring timely payment.
- Create travel requests in SAP for colleagues and external stakeholders.
- Supervision and training of junior member of staff on administration and procedures.
- Recruitment administration relating to temporary and permanent staff members.

2) Meetings Assistant:
- Full support and organisation of meetings, including invitations and documentation to all delegations of the ICC States Parties.
- Coordinate the format and translation of official documents, liaising with freelance translators when necessary.
- Assist delegates and Ambassadors during meetings (welcome, escort, information).
- Organisation of venue, catering requirements, participant lists, presentations and interpretation.
- Finalise external venue contracts and ensure timely payment.
- Translation of short documents and messages in English/French.', 'title': 'HR/Finance Assistant and Meetings Assistant (dual role)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 165285, 'name': 'Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQExgCORoBO_BQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1642691570953?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=6ffc3o3n3ACaeYZoeQorRTivPTL6_zC6GLnBIbMNmtI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/organisation-eco-cooperation-development-organisation-cooperation-developpement-eco/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1995}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Paris, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'OECD - OCDE', 'description': 'Achievements:  Appointed as Controller (Certifying Officer in HR and Finance), as an additional role from 2007 to 2009:
Control and management of team output; Supervision and training team on systems and procedures; Monitoring contractual payments.

Two different positions with similar tasks (dual roles), Economics Department:
  1)	2005-2009: Financial/HR Assistant, and Personal Assistant to Deputy Director and to a committee Chairman (based in Switzerland); and
  2)	2001-2005: Financial/HR Assistant, and Personal Assistant to Head of Non-Member Economies Division:
- Be the focal point in the department between my office, internal and external stakeholders.
- Organise meetings with high officials and experts (up to around 80 persons) and seminars.
- Organise travel and accommodation for the experts invited to our seminars.
- Keep calendars of business travels and meetings updated in SharePoint.
- Post extracts of the OECD Economic Surveys on Internet (www.oecd.org/eco/surveys).
- Format official documents from draft to final publication in the respect of deadlines and embargo dates.
- Ensure translations of official documents and publications.
- Take minutes during division meetings and draft summary records (in English).
- Create contracts for consultants and submit remunerations in due time.
- Monitor the budget for the non-member countries activities (regular budget and grants).
- Submit financial reports, forecast provisional expenses for the Department’s Programme of Work and Budget.', 'title': 'Personal Assistant to Deputy Director and Finance/HR Controller (dual role)', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Paris, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}}, 'company': 'OECD - OCDE', 'description': 'Management Support Unit (Economics Department):

- Prepare job vacancies for internal and external publication.
- Invite shortlisted candidates, book accommodation, travel tickets and send per diems on time.
- Organise panel interviews, welcome candidates, supervise written tests.
- Fill-in interview reports and nomination forms.
- Prepare contracts for new staff members, calculate allowances, submit payments to consultants.
- Update staff turnover records, mobility statistics, databases.
- Prepare welcome packages for newcomers.', 'title': 'Recruitment Officer', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Paris, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1995}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'company': 'OECD - OCDE', 'description': '- Support to various directorates of the OECD, such as the Deputy Secretary-General’s office and the Economics Department: meetings and related documents, official travels.
- Support to the Human Resources Management: HR and salary related administration; maintaining HR files.', 'title': 'Bilingual Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Social Aid Association', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1994}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1995}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Mont-de-Marsan, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 1994}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 1995}}, 'company': 'Social Aid Association', 'description': '- Book-keeping tasks of the association (financed by the municipality and by voluntary contributions).
- Assist job-seekers: CVs, suggest training sessions, communicate useful addresses.
- Organise meetings with other associations of the municipality, take minutes, draft summaries.', 'title': 'Book-keeper and job seekers assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}]
